title: Best Team Ever? Jumbo-Visma Closes Out 2023 with 69 Victories, and Questions About Its Future
content:
With Primož Roglič leaving for Bora-Hansgrohe in 2024, this could be the high-water mark for the team's 'total cycling' approach. Right now, everyone is simply enjoying the moment.

Read the full article at Best Team Ever? Jumbo-Visma Closes Out 2023 with 69 Victories, and Questions About Its Future on Velo.
author: ahood
